name: Cosmological Constance
description:
After the Big Bang gravity is the only force acting on the new galaxies. Can you help the universe expand?
How to Play:
- You receive points over time for every active galaxy
- Galaxies will attract each other and merge if too close - Click anywhere to expand the spacetime
- Expanding spacetime will push the galaxies away
- Be careful, galaxies outside the visible universe are still bound to gravity

Updated:

- GameOver screen wasn't triggered because the code wasn't there at all (first time git user :( )

- Fixed Audio bug when leaving game

- Fixed score display
